entry.title: $2300 // NO FEE 3BR Apt in Park Slope - H/HW incl 23rd St greenwood sunset
entry.content:
NO FEE 3BR Apt
3 UNITS AVAILABLE
CHARLES 212.470.0242



The apartment is very homey and comfortable; conveniently located off the 25th Street top off the R train in Brooklyn (15 minute ride to NYC). A 4th floor walk up unit with exposed brick walls, quiet & safe space

This apartment unlike other apartments in that you really get the best of everything. It's walking distance to some of the most exciting places in Brooklyn. The Barclays Center, The Bell House, Greenwood Beer Garden are some of the best finds! Historic Greenwood Cemetery is also just a two block walk from it. You will not find yourself cramped in the bedrooms.
Contact Charles today to set up a viewing.
Charles Ega 212.470.0242
Ideal Properties Group
462 3rd Avenue
Brooklyn NY 11215
